bingConversationExpiredTip: This conversation has expired. You can't send messages anymore.

errorMsg.bardNeedLogin: You need to sign in to Bard first.
errorMsg.errSiderHighTrafficError: Sider.ai faces high traffic. Please try again later.
errorMsg.errSiderHighTrafficTip: Please consider upgrading to a premium account for stable access and to support our development.
errorMsg.howToGetMoreGPT4Queries: <1>Invite your friends</1> or <2>upgrade to premium</2> to get more Advanced Text queries
errorMsg.howToGetMoreGPT4QueriesPremium: <a123>Invite your friends</a123> to get more Advanced Text queries
errorMsg.OpenAIError: You can check the API key in the setting page.
errorMsg.runOutFreeMsg: You have used all of the free queries provided by us. ChatGPT APl is expensive, so please Upgrade to Our Premium Plan to support us. You can also use your own API key for free if you have.
errorMsg.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errorMsg.webAppNeedAuth: Please click the link to sign in to your ChatGPT webpage.
errorMsg.errSiderBasicTextLimit: You have reached our basic text rate query limit. At present, there is a restriction of {{N1}} messages every {{NUM2}} minutes. Alternatively, you can use advanced text query and return later.
errorMsg.errSiderAdvancedTextLimit: You have reached our advanced text rate query limit. At present, there is a restriction of {{N1}} messages every {{NUM2}} minutes. Alternatively, you can use basic text query and return later.

giveUsStar: Rate 5 stars to help us grow!

inviteModal.step3: They install extension & login. Rewards earned!
inviteModal.title: Invite & Rewards

siderModelDesc.bard: The model from Google (PaLM 2), performs well in advanced reasoning tasks.
siderModelDesc.claude-instant: The basic model from Anthropic, low latency, high throughput use cases.
siderModelDesc.claude2: The best-in-class offering model from Anthropic, superior performance on tasks that require complex reasoning.
siderModelDesc.gemini-pro: Best model for scaling across a wide range of tasks from Google.
siderModelDesc.gpt-3.5: Very fast, great for most everyday tasks.
siderModelDesc.gpt-4: Most capable model, best for complex tasks requiring advanced reasoning.
